messages.content: What is AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION and what does it do?
AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION is a plugin for multilingual translation of ComfyUI. It implements the translation of the resident menu bar, search bar, right-click context menu, and nodes.
What languages does AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION support for the menu?
The plugin currently supports Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), English, Japanese, Korean, and is looking for help to support more languages such as French, German, Japanese, and Korean.
How can I help with translating AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION into other languages?

If you are a native speaker of a language other than English and Chinese, you can contribute to the translation effort by opening a new 'Language Name' folder in the plugin directory, adding the language code in the LocaleMap.js file, and restarting the ComfyUI service.
How can I install the AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION plugin?
To install the AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION plugin, you need to clone the repository to the custom_nodes folder in ComfyUI and run the git clone command in the ComfyUI/custom_nodes directory.
How do I use the AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION plugin?
To use the AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION plugin, you need to launch ComfyUI, open the menu, and click on the language option to switch languages.
What are the limitations of the AIGODLIKE-COMFYUI-TRANSLATION plugin?

The plugin currently has two limitations. The first is that direct switching of any language node to the target language will lose custom names. The second is that a small portion of options that use Enum type data cannot be translated.
